TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit WebPartDisplayMode extends System.Object

summary.span: 为 Web 部件页可以进入的若干种显示模式定义一组公用属性。

span.span: Defines a common set of properties for the several display modes that a Web Parts page can enter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件页可以输入多个不同的显示模式。A Web Parts page can enter several different display modes. 在每个显示模式下，Web 部件用户界面 (UI) 的某些元素隐藏或显示，以及某些类型的页的用户修改已启用或禁用。In each display mode, certain elements of the Web Parts user interface (UI) are either hidden or displayed, and certain kinds of user modifications to a page are either enabled or disabled. 控件包含 Web 部件控件集中, 可用的显示模式的实现并管理页面的显示模式。The control contains the implementation for the display modes that are available in the Web Parts control set, and manages the display modes for a page. 下表列出了表示的可用显示模式的字段。The following table lists fields that represent the available display modes. |显示模式Display mode|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| ||最终用户在其中查看页面在正常模式下显示 Web 部件控件和 UI 元素。Displays Web Parts controls and UI elements in the normal mode in which end users view a page.| ||显示区域 UI 元素，并使用户能够将 Web 部件控件要更改页面的布局。Displays zone UI elements and enables users to drag Web Parts controls to change the layout of a page.| ||显示特殊编辑 UI 元素，并使最终用户能够编辑页面上的控件。Displays special editing UI elements and enables end users to edit the controls on a page.| ||显示特殊的目录，UI 元素，并使最终用户能够添加和删除页面控件。Displays special catalog UI elements and enables end users to add and remove page controls.| ||显示特殊的连接用户界面元素，并使最终用户能够连接 Web 部件控件。Displays special connections UI elements and enables end users to connect Web Parts controls.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 Web 部件页上的显示模式以声明方式使用。The following code examples demonstrate the declarative use of display modes on a Web Parts page. 每种显示模式下，由 Web 部件控件集中实现，派生自类。Each of these display modes, as implemented by the Web Parts control set, is derived from the class. 此代码示例包含四个部分：This code example has four parts: - 自定义控件。A custom control. - 与区域托管自定义控件的网页。A Web page with a zone to host the custom control. - 使用户能够更改的用户控件在网页上显示模式。A user control that enables users to change display modes on the Web page. - 页面在浏览器中的工作方式的说明。An explanation of how the page works in a browser. 该示例的第一部分是一个自定义控件， `TextDisplayWebPart`。The first part of the example is a custom control, `TextDisplayWebPart`. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 这两种方法编译的演示，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a demonstration of both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#9)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#9)] 代码示例的第二部分是引用标准 ASP.NET 网页控件中``元素，以便与包装控件控件和在运行时提供基本 Web 部件的功能。The second part of the code example is a Web page that references a standard ASP.NET control within an `` element, so that the control is wrapped with a control and given basic Web Parts functionality at run time. 该页还引用`TextDisplayWebPart`控件中``元素，该示例演示了最终用户能够切换到目录模式下和向页添加控件。The page also references the `TextDisplayWebPart` control within an `` element, which demonstrates the end user's ability to switch to catalog mode and add controls to the page. 此页还包含``元素，它使用户能够编辑中包含的控件``当页面处于编辑模式。The page also includes an `` element, which enables users to edit the controls contained in the `` when the page is in edit mode. 页面顶部附近是`register`指令的自定义控件，另一个用于用户控件。Near the top of the page are a `register` directive for the custom control and another one for the user control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/CS/WebPartDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/VB/WebPartDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 代码示例的第三个部分是使用户能够在网页上切换显示模式的用户控件。The third part of the code example is a user control that enables users to switch display modes on a Web page. 将此控件的源代码保存在一个名为 DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx 或 DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx （具体取决于哪种语言使用的代码示例），文件并将其放在与 Web 页相同的目录中。Save the source code for this control in a file named DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx or DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx (depending on which language you use for the code example), and put it in the same directory as the Web page. 有关更多详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见本主题[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see the topic [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartDisplayMode_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 当在浏览器页面加载时，可以使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件切换到不同的显示模式。When you load the page in a browser, you can use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to different display modes. 若要编辑控件，请选择**编辑**下拉列表控件中。To edit controls, select **Edit** in the drop-down list control. 若要编辑的特定控件，通过单击控件的标题栏中的箭头，然后单击公开其谓词菜单**编辑**的谓词菜单中。To edit a specific control, expose its verbs menu by clicking the arrow in the control's title bar, and then clicking **Edit** in the verbs menu. 当控件处于编辑模式时，编辑控件添加到此页，可以更改编辑的控件的外观和布局。When a control is in edit mode, the editing controls added to this page enable you to change the edited control's appearance and layout. 在完成后，请选择**浏览**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件以将页返回到普通视图。When you are finished, select **Browse** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to a normal view. 若要将控件添加到页面中，切换到目录模式。To add controls to the page, switch to catalog mode. 请注意，您可以使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，或单击页面底部附近的按钮。Notice that you can either use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, or click the button near the bottom of the page. 内联代码`Button1_Click`方法演示如何以编程方式更改显示模式。The inline code for the `Button1_Click` method demonstrates how to change display modes programmatically. 在目录模式下时，可以添加自定义`TextDisplayWebPart`到页面的控件。While you are in catalog mode, you can add the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page.

para.span: 开发人员可以从派生类，以创建自定义显示模式。

span.span: Developers can derive from the class to create custom display modes.

para.span: 若要使自定义Web 部件页上可用，您还需要派生自类，并重写其方法。

span.span: To make a custom available on a Web Parts page, you would also need to derive from the class, and override its method.

related.span: 概述： Web 部件控件集

span.span: Overview: The Web Parts Control Set
Web Parts Page Display Modes

related.span: 演练： 更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name) cil managed

span.span: The name of the display mode.

summary.span: 为显示模式的名称初始化一个值。

span.span: Initializes a value for the name of the display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个因为类是抽象的永远不会创建对象。A object is never created because the class is abstract. 在运行时，控件使用类作为基的类来创建各种页显示模式下的每个对象。At run time, the control uses the class as the base class to create objects for each of the various page display modes.

span.span: The parameter is .

para.span: 如果从其中派生类来创建自定义显示模式，你必须调用基构造函数并将包含自定义显示模式的名称的字符串传递给它的类声明中。

span.span: If you derive from the class to create a custom display mode, in your class declaration you must call the base constructor and pass to it a string containing the name of the custom display mode.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AllowPageDesign As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AllowPageDesign { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值确定当一个 Web 部件页处于某种特定显示模式时，用户是否能够更改页面布局。

span.span: Gets a value that determines whether users can change the layout of a Web Parts page when the page is in a certain display mode.

value.span: 如果用户可以更改页面布局，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if users can change the page layout; otherwise, .
The default is .
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property AssociatedWithToolZone As Boolean
public: virtual property bool AssociatedWithToolZone { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示某种显示模式是否与一个从 类中派生的类关联。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a certain display mode is associated with a class that derives from the class.

value.span: 如果显示模式与一个 类关联，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the display mode is associated with a class; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件页进入一种显示模式时其属性设置为`true`，则控件将解释，表示关联的类派生类，并该附加用户界面 (UI) 元素若要显示的需要。When a Web Parts page enters a display mode whose property is set to `true`, the control interprets that to mean that an associated class derives from the class, and that additional user interface (UI) elements need to be displayed. 例如，页进入编辑模式，特殊区域，其中包含用于编辑 Web 部件控件的 UI 元素显示在页面上。For example, when a page enters edit mode, special zones that contain UI elements for editing Web Parts controls appear on the page. 此行为伤害因为上的属性值字段设置为`true`。This behavior is made possible because the property value on the field is set to `true`.

para.span: 派生的类若要创建自定义显示模式的基类必须重写属性，以便将其值设置。

span.span: Classes that derive from the base class to create custom display modes must override the property in order to set its value.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

The default is .

span.span: However, when is set to , and personalization is disabled on the page, the default will be .
